original_text: Moses put the large bowl for water between the Tent of Meeting and the altar. He put water in it for the priests to wash themselves.
korean_text: 그는 또 물두멍을 회막과 제단 사이에 두고 거기 씻을 물을 담으니라

sentences.original_text: Moses put the large bowl for water
between the Tent of Meeting and the altar
for the priests to wash themselves
